### Summary

The National Research Council (NRC) seeks multidisciplinary engineering consultant services for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Newfoundland and Labrador. This announcement relates to the solicitation # NL22SO01 and supersedes any existing solicitations.

### Key Dates

* Publication date: November 3, 2022
* Tender closing date: December 12, 2022 at 14:00:00
* Amendment date: November 10, 2022

### Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from consulting firms to provide multidisciplinary engineering services on behalf of the DND in Newfoundland and Labrador. The contract will be awarded for a period of three (3) years with a maximum estimated value of $750,000.

### Eligibility Criteria

* The contractor must be registered in the professional services directory [directory.name].
* The contractor must be qualified to provide services related to the following G-Code categories: C111A, C116A, C117A, and C119A.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria will be based on the established criteria outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Security Requirements

Security requirements for this project are outlined in the RFP documents. These will need to be addressed by the selected contractor.

### Tender Requirements

* Interested firms must submit their proposals electronically through the MERX Bidding System on or before the closing date and time.
* Proposal submissions must meet the established requirements outlined in the RFP documents.

### Inquiries

For further information and clarification of requirements, please contact:
Ms Camille Attia
Phone: 613-715-0564
E-mail: camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

### End of Inquiries
